BCA Resmi Akuisisi Bank Royal
04 Nov 2019, 12:28 by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - PT Bank Central Asia Tbk (BCA) resmi mengakuisisi PT Bank Royal Indonesia. Mengutip siaran pers, perjanjian jual beli ini dilakukan setelah BCA mendapatkan persetujuan efektif dari Otoritas Jasa Keuangan (OJK).Dengan perjanjian akta jual beli itu 99,99% saham Bank Royal telah menjadi milik BCA dan 0,01% menjadi milik PT BCA Finance.Direktur BCA Subur Tan menjelaskan keputusan mengakuisisi Bank Royal merupakan langkah strategis BCA dalam rangka melengkapi layanan perbankan BCA demi menjangkau kebutuhan nasabah di Tanah Air. "Dalam jangka panjang, akuisisi ini juga diharapkan dapat memberikan added value yang berkesinambungan bagi semua stakeholders," ujar Subur Tan dalam siaran pers, Senin (4/11/2019).Bank Royal adalah bank swasta yang masuk dalam kategori bank BUKU I. Seiring dengan perkembangan kebutuhan nasabah dan masyarakat, BCA tengah mengkaji Bank Royal untuk fokus ke segmen perbankan digital.Diharapkan hal tersebut semakin melengkapi solusi perbankan BCA, untuk memberikan kemudahan dan kenyamanan bagi nasabah.Simak Video "Berburu Tiket Murah Hingga Nginap di Mall? BCA Officially Acquires Bank Royal
Nov 04 2019, 12:28 p.m. by Sylke Febrina Laucereno


Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - PT Bank Central Asia Tbk (BCA) has officially acquired PT Bank Royal Indonesia. Quoting the press release, this sale and purchase agreement was made after BCA received effective approval from the Financial Services Authority (OJK). With the sale and purchase agreement, 99.99% of Bank Royal shares had become BCA's and 0.01% belonged to PT BCA Finance. BCA Director Subur Tan explained that the decision to acquire Bank Royal was a strategic step for BCA in order to complement BCA's banking services to reach the needs of customers in the country. "In the long run, this acquisition is also expected to provide sustainable added value for all stakeholders," Subur Tan said in a press release on Monday (11/04/2019). Bank Royal is a private bank that is included in the BUKU I. bank category. with the development of the needs of customers and the community, BCA is reviewing Bank Royal to focus on the digital banking segment.
